Exercise 4 (List, Image, Video, and Audio)

Unfamiliar Words

    Definition of Dandelions
    Dandelions
    Any of a genus (Taraxacum) of yellow-flowered composite herbs with milky sap especially : one (T. officinale) sometimes grown as a potherb and nearly cosmopolitan as a weed.
    Definition of Lifetime
    Lifetime
    The duration of the existence of a living being (such as a person or an animal) or a thing (such as a star or a subatomic particle).
    Definition of Field
    Field
    An open land area free of woods and buildings.
    Definition of Wishing
    Wishing
    To want or desire (something, often that which cannot be or is not the case).
    Definition of Alive
    Alive
    Still in existence, force, or operation.

    Information/Background of the Song

  • "Dandelions" is a song by Canadian singer Ruth B., originally released as a promotional single from her 2017 album Safe Haven. It was re-issued separately in a "slowed + reverb" version in August 2021. In 2022, the song charted internationally after going viral on TikTok.
  • Ruth B. called the track "probably the lightest and cutest song" on Safe Haven and said she started writing it after watching an interview with Sia, part of whose advice on songwriting was to choose a "pretty word" to "write around". Ruth B. then "look[ed] out the window" several weeks later and "saw a dandelion, and [...] started writing the song" in part because she thought "dandelion" was a "pretty word".
    • Link

Exercises Reflection

In Exercise 4, I explored the integration of multimedia elements and list structures within HTML, working with tags such as ul, img, video, and audio, along with hyperlink elements for referencing sources. This exercise broadened my perspective on how diverse forms of media can coexist harmoniously within a webpage to create a richer and more dynamic user experience. As I combined text, visual components, and audio-visual content, I began to understand how each element contributes a different layer of engagement. Images help convey information visually, videos provide a more immersive form of communication, and audio clips add depth and interactivity. The list structures further contributed to the clarity and organization of the content, demonstrating how purposeful layout choices can guide the reader’s attention. While the exercise required careful planning and precise application of tags, it also encouraged creative expression. I found it fulfilling to build a webpage that not only functioned technically but also showcased personality and thoughtful design. Incorporating one of my favorite songs, “Dandelions,” made the task even more meaningful and reminded me that coding can be both analytical and expressive. Ultimately, this activity strengthened my skills in multimedia integration and deepened my appreciation for HTML’s capacity to support interactive, engaging, and informative web experiences.

Author: Isabella Faith A. Delamida
